author: ate
msg: Empty string values for parameters (e.g. "") are handled differently by Oracle which automatically converts those to NULL values.
Other database don't have this problem, but for Oracle there really is no workaround so we simply need to allow NULL values here.

author: seelmann
msg: Fix for DIRSTUDIO-336: Use schema parser with enabled quirks mode.

author: seelmann
msg: Fix for DIRSHARED-8: Added quirks mode for schema parsers that
o disables constraints like 'NO-USER-MODIFICATION requries operational USAGE'
